exceptions.tactic: intros v u l l2 l1 H1 H2 H3.
intros v' u l l2 l1 H1 H2 H3.
intros v' u' l l2 l1 H1 H2 H3.
intros v' u' l' l2 l1 H1 H2 H3.
intros v' u' l' l2' l1 H1 H2 H3.
intros v' u' l' l2' l1' H1 H2 H3.

original: intros v u l l2 l1 H1 H2 H3. intros eps. destruct l1, l2. - unfold is_lim_seq in *. intros H4 H5. specialize (H1 eps). specialize (H2 eps). destruct H1 as [N1 H1], H2 as [N2 H2]. pose (N := max N1 N2). exists N. intros n Hn.
